=== jChat is one of the easiest ways to add some comunication to your personal/business website. The installation process includes _4_ easy steps and shouldn't take more then 10 minutes to complete. If you find any issues during the installation proccess, please [http://code.google.com/p/es-jchat/issues/list report] them.  ===

==Please follow the installation steps as mentioned bellow:==

 # Download the [http://es-jchat.googlecode.com/files/jChat-latest.zip latest] version of jChat.
 # Extract and upload the files to the `root` directory of your website.
 # Configure jChat for your needs.
 # Integrate jChat into your system.
 # Enjoy!
